channel.title: Comments on: Why does my variable always have NULL in it?
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: SQLDenis
item.dc:creator: SQLDenis

item.title: By: Scott
item.dc:creator: Scott
item.content:encoded:
You could also add the following:

SET CONCAT_NULL_YIELDS_NULL OFF

DECLARE @AllImportantVarToRunThisScript VARCHAR(30)
DECLARE @MyVarThatIKnowHasValue VARCHAR(30)

SET @AllImportantVarToRunThisScript = (SELECT ‘MyPretendCharColumn’) + @MyVarThatIKnowHasValue

SELECT @AllImportantVarToRunThisScript
